name: Modrinth Store
description: Browse, search, and install Minecraft mods and modpacks from Modrinth directly inside your AirLink admin panel.
longDescription: The Modrinth Store addon integrates Modrinth directly into your AirLink panel. Browse, search, and install mods or modpacks from the admin panel with full feature control, progress bars, and a clean UI.
author: g-flame
features: Browse and search the Modrinth mod database
Admin panel integration with sidebar entry
